Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
Punch.display_target_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.

Haymaker.display_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Haymaker.display_target_help: The Haymaker is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential

Summon_Miner.display_help: Summons 1 to 2 Enraged Miners to fight for you.
Summon_Miner.display_target_help: Summons 1 to 2 Enraged Miners to fight for you.

Dynamite.display_help: The explosion from the Dynamite affects all within the blast and can knock them back and even stun them.
Dynamite.display_target_help: The explosion from the Dynamite affects all within the blast and can knock them back and even stun them.

Baseball_Bat.display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

Scrap.display_help: Enraged Miners throw whatever they can get their hands on as a weapon.
Scrap.display_target_help: Enraged Miners throw whatever they can get their hands on as a weapon.

Maul.display_help: Ghost of Scrapyard has Disoriented you.
Maul.display_target_help: Ghost of Scrapyard has Disoriented you.

Fissure.display_help: The Ghost of Scrapyard smashes the ground deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back.
Fissure.display_target_help: The Ghost of Scrapyard smashes the ground deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back.

Spirit_Wrack.display_help: The Ghost of Scrapyard slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy.
Spirit_Wrack.display_target_help: The Ghost of Scrapyard slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy.

Wave_of_Shadows.display_help: The Ghost of Scrapyard unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy.
Wave_of_Shadows.display_target_help: Wave of Shadow has reduced your Accuracy.

Jackhammer.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Jackhammer.
Jackhammer.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Jackhammer.

Dynamite.display_help: The explosion from the Dynamite affects all within the blast and can knock them back and even stun them.
Dynamite.display_target_help: The explosion from the Dynamite affects all within the blast and can knock them back and even stun them.

Fire_Bomb.display_help: The explosion from the Fire Bomb affects all within the blast and sets them on fire.
Fire_Bomb.display_target_help: The explosion from the Fire Bomb affects all within the blast and sets them on fire.

Pick_Axe.display_help: You Defense has been reduced by the Pick Axe.
Pick_Axe.display_target_help: You Defense has been reduced by the Pick Axe.

Scrap.display_help: Enraged Miners throw whatever they can get their hands on as a weapon.
Scrap.display_target_help: Enraged Miners throw whatever they can get their hands on as a weapon.

Shovel.display_help: This shovel has a chance of knocking you silly.
Shovel.display_target_help: This shovel has a chance of knocking you silly.

Sledgehammer.display_help: This heavy Sledgehammer can knock down foes.
Sledgehammer.display_target_help: This heavy Sledgehammer can knock down foes.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: The Sea Witch can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the him. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.
Lightning_Storm.display_target_help: The Sea Witch can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches her. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

Thunder_Clap.display_help: The Sea Witch's Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.
Thunder_Clap.display_target_help: The Sea Witch's Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

Tornado.display_help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.display_short_help: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DAM (Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Gale.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Gale.display_target_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Sea Witch can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: The Sea Witch can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Havoc_Punch.display_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.
Havoc_Punch.display_target_help: You are rendered helpless by the electrical attack. Any form of damage will free you from this state.

Hurricane.display_help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.
Hurricane.display_target_help: The driving winds of the Hurricane are blinding you. Your Range and Accuracy are reduced.

Static_Discharge.display_help: Discharges a cone of Static Electricity that deals damage and drains Endurance from all affected foes in the area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
